casebody.data:
Marlo SORRE, Petitioner-Appellee, v. UNITED STATES of America, Respondent-Appellant. No. 163, Docket 21876. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Jan. 11, 1951. Decided Jan. 24, 1951. Morris AJbramson, New York City, for petitioner-appellee. Irving H. Saypol, U. S. Atty., for Southern District of New York, New York City, John M. Cunneen, Asst. U. S. Atty., New York City, of counsel, for respondent-appellant.

Before CHASE, CLARK and FRANK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed on the authority of Schmidt v. United States, 2 Cir., 177 F.2d 450 and United States v. Burke, 2 Cir., 185 F.2d 678.
